unnormalised: Yeah, I had a terrible experience with Speedy Delivery last week. They were supposed to deliver a package to my home at 12/B, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050 but they delivered it to 12/C instead! Luckily, my neighbour called me, but what if they hadn't? I had specifically mentioned "near the CCD" as a landmark. Seriously, their delivery guys need some better training.
normalised: Yeah, I had a terrible experience with Speedy Delivery last week. They were supposed to deliver a package to my home at twelve slash B, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty but they delivered it to twelve slash C instead! Luckily, my neighbor called me, but what if they hadn't? I had specifically mentioned "near the C-C-D" as a landmark. Seriously, their delivery guys need some better training.
